To report historical and expected growth: Number of firms in the industry grouping.

Average of compounded annual growth rate in net income over last 5 years, among firms that have been in existence > 5 years. Only includes firms with positive earnings five years ago and current year.
Average of compounded annual growth rate in revenues over last 5 years, among firms that have been in existence > 5 years.

End Game: Expected Growth in Revenues - Next 2 years
To report historical and expected growth: Average of analyst estimates of annual growth rate in revenues for next two years.
Unnamed: 2: Analyst forecast of expected growth in revenues

End Game: Expected Growth in EPS - Next 5 years
To report historical and expected growth: Average of analyst estimates of annual growth rate in earnings  per sahre for next five years.
Unnamed: 2: Analyst forecast of expected growth in earnings per share
